original_text: And as they that bare the ark were come unto Jordan, and the feet of the priests that bare the ark were dipped in the brim of the water, (for Jordan overfloweth all his banks all the time of harvest,)
korean_text: 요단이 곡식 거두는 시기에는 항상 언덕에 넘치더라 궤를 멘 자들이 요단에 이르며 궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 물 가에 잠기자

sentences.original_text: And as they that bare the ark were come unto Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 궤를 메던 자들이 요단에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: and the feet of the priests that bare the ark
were dipped in the brim of the water
for Jordan overfloweth all his banks
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 요단이 그 모든 제방을 넘치기 때문이라
